name: constituent
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: constituent
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: one of the parts that a substance or combination is made of

example.eg: What are the basic constituents of the mixture?
example.egtrans: 这种混合物的基本成分是什么？

dsense.name: constituent
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a voter (= person who can vote) in a particular area of the country

example.eg: The MP worked hard, always talking to his constituents and listening to their problems.
example.egtrans: 这位参议员工作努力，总是跟本区选民交谈，听取他们的难处。
